rows.label: tev001293_MSG0001
rows.name:
[ST:playername ]! You're JUST in time.
You have to save me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0002
rows.name:
These women are fawning all over me,
and I don't know what to do...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_JNK0010
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: tev001293_SEL0011
rows.name: Advise Lin to accept their adoration with grace.

rows.label: tev001293_JNK0020
rows.name: Participate

rows.label: tev001293_SEL0021
rows.name: Join in and begin fawning over Lin.

rows.label: tev001293_JNK0030
rows.name: Intervene

rows.label: tev001293_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell the women to go away and stop bothering Lin.

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0003
rows.name:
Hey, don't get me wrong—I'm grateful for the attention.
I really am.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0004
rows.name:
I mean, they invite me out for cake, they ask me to
go on picnics...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0005
rows.name:
They're always wanting to go out on long drives or
to catch a movie together...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0006
rows.name:
They probably think I'm lonely because there aren't
any other girls here my age.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0007
rows.name:
That's really sweet and all, but I can't possibly do
all that stuff in a single day off![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0008
rows.name: H-hey! Stop that! Don't be a creep![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0009
rows.name:
It's just... Look, I know they mean well. I mean, they
invite me out for cake, they ask me to go on picnics...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0010
rows.name:
They're always wanting to go out on long drives or
to catch a movie together...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0011
rows.name:
But I'm a busy girl! I've got lots of errands and stuff
to run on my day off—I don't have time for all this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0012
rows.name: N-no, don't say anything! It's not THAT bad...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0013
rows.name:
It's just... Look, I know they mean well. I mean, they
invite me out for cake, they ask me to go on picnics...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0014
rows.name:
They're always wanting to go out on long drives or
to catch a movie together...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0015
rows.name:
That's really sweet and all, but I can't possibly do
all that stuff in a single day off![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_JNK0040
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: tev001293_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Lin she should focus on a single activity.

rows.label: tev001293_JNK0050
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: tev001293_SEL0051
rows.name:
Say she COULD do it all if
she made a mission out of it.

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0016
rows.name:
Yeah, you're probably right. If I could pick just one,
I might actually be able to enjoy it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0017
rows.name:
Hmm... Well, cake is always nice, but a picnic also
sounds pretty great right about now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0018
rows.name:
I bet going for a nice drive would be fun,
and I always enjoy a good movie...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0019
rows.name: Wait—I know![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0020
rows.name:
I'll invite everyone on an adventure to go search for one
of those great picnic spots we keep hearing about![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0021
rows.name:
We can drive there in my Skell, eat some cake and
relax under the sun, then come back home and catch
the latest kaiju flick before we crash. It'll be perfect![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0022
rows.name: Heeeey, not a bad idea! I like the way you think![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0023
rows.name: So let's see, what kind of mission would this be...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0024
rows.name:
Oh, I know! I'll invite everyone on an adventure
to go search for one of those great picnic spots
we keep hearing about![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0025
rows.name:
We can drive there in my Skell, eat some cake and
relax under the sun, then come back home and catch
the latest kaiju flick before we crash. Mission complete![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0026
rows.name: Hey, but wait a minute...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001293_MSG0027
rows.name:
If I turn my day off into a mission...is it really a day
off anymore?![ST:wait ]
